alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 2:42AM EDT until April 08 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE COMBINATION OF LOW AFTERNOON RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, SURFACE AND 20 FOOT WINDS IN EXCESS OF 15 MPH, AND ERC VALUES OF 28-32 FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 007, 008, 009, 010, 011, 012, AND 013... The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 007, 008, 009, 010, 011, 012, and 013. * WIND...Sustained west to northwest winds of 15-18 MPH and gusts to 25 MPH. 20 foot winds of 15-17 MPH. * HUMIDITY...22 to 27 percent * ERC...28 to 32 * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; Washington
